edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.core
Class Action

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.core.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
CallPhoneAction, SendGmailAction, SendSmsAction
public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object

Action provides a general wrapper for the intent to be fired. Classes that extend Action should provide the intent to be fired and execution method used to fire the intent.
